general.versionDoesNotExist: It seems that the module's version can not be retrieved. It's on our side please try again.
general.moduleNeedActivation: Marketing with Google is disabled, you will not be able to use any of it's features until you enable your module.

ps_eventbus.title:
**A newer version of PrestaShop CloudSync is requested**

 The version of the module PrestaShop CloudSync running on this shop is older than the minimum required .

You may use PrestaShop Marketing with Google but some features (i.e product synchronization) won't be available until you upgrade PrestaShop CloudSync.

psxmarketingwithgoogle.title:
**A newer version of PrestaShop Marketing With Google is available**

 It offers significant improvements and exciting features that will take your product usage to the next level.

1.53.0: Configure your product feed to target countries in several currencies
Get a better follow up of your product synchronization thanks to the new product feed page

general.adblockerActivated: Please deactivate your ad-blocker for the module to work properly and refresh your navigator.
general.unableToFetchData: We were unable to fetch datas, please try again later
general.createNewAccount: If you don't have an account, you can {0} today.

header.title: Marketing With Google
header.text: With Prestashop Marketing, you can reach potential buyers who are searching online for products like the ones you offer! Use this module to reach them on Google in 3 easy steps.

content1.title: Sync your product catalog with Google
content1.text: Connect your store to Google Merchant Center and synchronize your entire product catalog in a few clicks. Product attributes such as price and availability will be automatically updated everyday.

content2.title: Enable free listings for your products
content2.text:
Free listings allow to show your product attributes, including image and price in organically-ranked listings on the Shopping tab.  
 
 Once your catalog has been synchronised, enable free listings on your dashboard and start showing your products on the Shopping tab for free.
content2.footer:
Create a new [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"] or link an existing one.  
To show your products on Google you’ll need to meet the [eligibility requirements]({1})[:target="_blank"]

content3.title: Boost your reach and sales with Performance Max
content3.text: Want to maximize your campaign performance and find the right customers wherever they are?  From one single campaign, Performance Max collects data across different Google channels, and optimises your campaign performance by showing where your ads have higher chances of driving conversion.

footer.text: Get your products found on Google with PS Marketing with Google
footer.explanation: In the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom or Switzerland, Performance Max campaigns can be used with any Comparison Shopping Service (CSS) you work with. The ads will show on general search results pages and on any other surfaces the CSS has opted in to.

cmpAlert.title: GDPR updates
cmpAlert.paragraph: Starting March 2024, businesses advertising to users in the European Economic Area (EEA) must create a strong framework to collect and communicate end-users’ consent choices via consent banners integrated with Google’s Consent Mode. To build a strong foundation for measuring your ads you must set up a cookie banner through a supported, dedicated Consent Management Platform. If you do not already have one, we recommend that you use the following consent management platform, which is compliant with the new regulations: {link}
cmpAlert.moduleGDPR: Cookies GDPR Law (Blocker) + Google Consent Mode V2

sectionTitle.psAccount: Link your shop to your PrestaShop account

freeListing.title: Reach more people on Google with free listings
freeListing.subtitle: Free listings give you access to millions of shoppers searching for products similar to yours. Display your products for free in organically ranked listings on the Shopping tab when you connect your Google account to Google Merchant Center.
freeListing.lastTitle: Businesses using free listings and ads on the Shopping tab together have seen an average >50% increase in clicks and >100% increase in impressions. (Google Internal Data, July 2020)

smartShoppingCampaign.title: Advertise on Google with Performance Max
smartShoppingCampaign.subtitle:
Connect or create your Google Ads account and launch a Performance Max campaign for your products. Maximize your campaign performance across multiple Google channels through one single campaign. Show your ads where they have higher chances of driving conversion.

 Even better, you don't pay unless your customers click.

onboarding.productFeedNotice: Help customers to find your products more easily on Google and list them for free with free listings. Free listings help reach more customers and get them to visit your site.

multiShopSelector.title: Multi-store mode activated
multiShopSelector.subtitle: You must configure your stores one by one for this service but you will be able to use the same account.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Please select the first store to configure from the list below
multiShopSelector.tips: After you are done with the first shop, you can configure the others by selecting them one by one in the shop selector, in the horizontal menu

googleAccountCard.title: Google account
googleAccountCard.introDisabled: Connect your Google account and associated with it Google Merchant Center to unlock free listings.
googleAccountCard.introEnabled: Access through PrestaShop module associated with your email account Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
googleAccountCard.footerDissociating: PrestaShop uses this account to manage and sync Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
googleAccountCard.alertCantConnect: You can't connect to your Google account right now. Try again later.
googleAccountCard.alertTokenMissing: We weren't able to authenticate your account. Try again or switch to another account.
googleAccountCard.alertInfo:
Make sure to allow all requested permissions when authenticating your Google account.  
This action is mandatory for this service to work properly.
googleAccountCard.missingTokenScopes:
Some requested permissions are missing.  
All requested permissions are mandatory for this service to work properly, please manage your account and make sure to allow all of them.

mcaCard.title: Merchant Center account
mcaCard.introDisabled: Link your Merchant Center account to PrestaShop to facilitate synchronization of your store and product data.
mcaCard.claimCollides: Your website has been already claimed.
mcaCard.claimOverwrite: To finish Merchant Center account creation, you need to overwrite the existing claim.
mcaCard.footerEU: For stores in the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom or Switzerland, your Merchant Center account is required to be associated with to a [Comparison Shopping Service (CSS)]({0})[:target="_blank"]. For new Merchant Center accounts created through this application, your account would be associated by default with Google Shopping, Google’s CSS. You can change the CSS associated with your account at any time and you can also find CSS Partners here. Once you have set up your Merchant Center account you can use our onboarding tool regardless of which CSS you use.
mcaCard.shopInfoMissingDescription: To complete missing store information please go to your [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"].
mcaCard.shopMaintenance:
You cannot connect a Google Merchant Center account while Maintenance mode is active.  
 Please change your shop parameters.
mcaCard.linkingFailed: You can't connect to your Merchant Center account right now. Try again later.
mcaCard.unlinkFailed: Disconnection failed. Please refresh the page and try again.
mcaCard.tryAgainLater: We can’t verify or claim the current site. **We recommend that you ensure that the site is accessible** and try again later.
mcaCard.alertSuspendedDescription: Google suspended your Merchant Center account due to policy violations. Your products are no longer being promoted. Review the suspension reason, analyze your account, and take the necessary steps to meet the requirements. {0}.
mcaCard.alertSuspendedLearnMore: Learn more about the account suspension
mcaCard.overwriteToBeDoneManually: Your website has been already claimed on another merchant center account. As we are not administrator of your account, we cannot overwrite this claim for you. Please go to your [Google Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] , and change the Website URL with this one : {1}
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListing: Your account is ineligible for free enhanced listings on Google
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListingDescription: Please examine product-level disapprovals as well as your overall account.
mcaCard.claimOverwriteWithManualAction: To finalize your Google Merchant Center account connection, you need to provide your website URL ({0}) in your Google Merchant Center account.
mcaCard.newGmcNotListed: Waiting for your account to be published
mcaCard.newGmcNotListedDescription: If you just created a new account, it means Google is still building it. You have to wait or come back later. This operation can take up to 5 minutes on Google side. In other cases, check that your GMC is still existing, and that you still have rights on it.
mcaCard.phoneVerificationNeededDescription: To be able to use your Merchant Center account you have to verify your phone number
mcaCard.phoneVerifiedContinue: Your phone number has been verified, you can continue your account creation.
mcaCard.textMessageHasBeenSent: A text message containing an X-digit code has been sent
mcaCard.askAgain60sec: You will be able to ask for a new code in 60 seconds
mcaCard.needPhoneVerification: We need to verify your identity with your phone number
mcaCard.fillInputs: Please fill in your phone number and select your international prefix
mcaCard.phoneNumberNotValid: Your phone number is incorrect, please only put numbers
mcaCard.selectMethod: Please select the desired method of contact to verify your identity
mcaCard.alertTooManyRequests: You have requested this service too many times with this phone number. You need to wait 24 hours to try again or change your phone number.
mcaCard.alertSomethingHappened: Something happened. It's on our side please try again.
mcaCard.alertCodeExpired: The code has expired. Please ask for another one
mcaCard.refreshAfterAddingWebsiteAddress: If you added a new information on Google Merchant Center, please refresh your page.

mcaRequirements.title: Create new Merchant Center account
mcaRequirements.legend: To participate in free listings and advertise on Google you must acknowledge and comply with below requirements:
mcaRequirements.legend2:
Store's website URL needs to be verified and claimed before you can upload products data.  
[Learn how to verify and claim your website](https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/176793?hl=en&ref_topic=3163841)[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.footer: Read full version of Google store requirements

accurateContactInformation.title: I confirm that my contact information are correct and valid
accurateContactInformation.description: Merchants need to have at least one contact method listed on their website, this can be any type of contact method.
accurateContactInformation.link: Discover how to add contact information

secureCheckoutProcess.title: I confirm that I have a clear checkout & data collection
secureCheckoutProcess.description: Do not misuse information about user, nor collect it for unclear purposes or without appropriate security measures.
secureCheckoutProcess.link: Learn about irresponsible data collection & use

returnPolicy.title: I confirm that my return & refund policy are setup on my website
returnPolicy.description: Return and refund policy needs to be clear (include requirement and timelines) and easy to access on your website.
returnPolicy.link: Learn how to set up return policies

billingTerms.title: I confirm that my billing terms and conditions are clear and visible
billingTerms.description: Website needs to clearly and visibly disclose payment options and all expenses that user will bare, before and after purchase.

completeCheckoutProcess.title: I confirm that I have a complete checkout process
completeCheckoutProcess.description: Users need to be able to successully complete purchase process.

mcaRequirements.websiteURLDescription: The website used to create your Merchant Center account
mcaRequirements.storeNameDescription: This name will appear in your free listings and Shopping ads.
mcaRequirements.changeCountryField: You can [change your country]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeRegionField: You can [change your region]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeAddressField: You can [change your business address]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeZipCodeField: You can [change your zipcode]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeCityField: You can [change your city]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changePhoneNumberField: You can [change your business phone number]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.labelReadAndAgree: By purchasing Shopping ads, I have read and agree to comply with [Google's terms and policies]({0})[:target="_blank"], including [Google’s Merchant Center terms of service]({1})[:target="_blank"], [Shopping ads policies]({2})[:target="_blank"], and [Google Ads Terms and Conditions]({3})[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.alert: Your store will be reviewed so if one of these requirements is missing, your account will be suspended.
mcaRequirements.phoneFormat: Your business phone number isn't a valid format (only accept number) please change it.
mcaRequirements.updateData: If you have made any modification in your backoffice, please refresh your information to see the changes reflected here.

gmcAccountIssues.title: More details about account issues
gmcAccountIssues.description: Your account has been flagged for potential performance and compliance issues. Please review the detailed information provided to understand and address these concerns promptly

productFeedCard.title: Product feed
productFeedCard.intro: Link your products of your catalog to showcase your products on free listings. Pricing and product availability are automatically updated daily, giving your customers access to the most recent and fairly priced products you have on offer!
productFeedCard.introToConfigure: It's important to submit your product feed in the correct format, as Google uses this to make sure your products match the right queries.
productFeedCard.alertFeedSettingSubmissionSuccess: You have successfully submitted your product data to Merchant Center. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertFailed: Product sync was not successful. Check possible reasons in [Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] or contact [customer support](mailto:support-google@prestashop.com).
productFeedCard.alertShippingSettingsMissingDescription: In order to successfully synchronize your product feed, please add shipping information.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedDeactivated: If the product sync is deactivated, there will be no new products pushed into the GMC. The account itself will continue to exist and the products will expire after 30 days. This stops the catalog items to show on both Free Listings and the ad campaigns.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedExists:
**A product feed already exists**  
<small>Your product feed already exists. You need to overwrite it to sync your PrestaShop product feed. </small>
productFeedCard.attributeDescription: With these attributes, you can organize your advertising campaigns in Google Ads and override the category automatically assigned by Google in some cases.
productFeedCard.alertGoogleIsReviewingProducts:
Your products are being reviewed  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertErrorApi: You can't send your products data to Google right now. Try again later.

steps.shippingSettingsErrors: This country is not compatible with your currency

productFeedSettings.noticeDataStored: Settings are saved at each step, will be submitted only at the final step.
productFeedSettings.submissionExplanation: Please note that data would be stored at each step but would only be submitted at the final step.

shippingSetup.title: Shipping setup
shippingSetup.mandatoryStep: For your products to be shown by Google Merchant Center, shipping is a mandatory step.
shippingSetup.stepExplanation: This can help customers who are browsing your products on Google see your delivery rates and times.

estimateOption.title: I can estimate shipping rates & times
estimateOption.description: You can easily set flat shipping rate and delivery times. You will not be required to import or update your shipping information from Prestashop back office.

importOption.title: I’d like to import my shipping setup from PrestaShop back office
importOption.description: Prestashop will import shipping settings that are already set up in your back office. You can choose which shipping service provider you’d like to use per target country.

validationErrors.needOptionToBeChosen: You need to select one option to continue

tooltips.carrierName: The carrier name will help you identify the carriers when it is created with the estimation method. It is limited to 90 characters
tooltips.freeShippingOverAmount: Enter the value of minimum spend required for free shipping
tooltips.shippingRate: Enter the shipping rate that applies below the minimum set amount spend required for free shipping

deliveryTimeAndRates.title: Delivery time & rates
deliveryTimeAndRates.deliveryInfo: Enter the minimum and maximum days required for delivery

customRate.title: Choose a flat or custom rate for your target countries
customRate.rateDesc: I can estimate the same shipping rate and delivery time for all countries
customRate.customDesc: I'd like to set different rates and times for each country

storeOffers.flatShippingRateForAllProducts: Flat shipping rate for all products
storeOffers.freeShippingOverAmount: Free shipping over a set amount

shippingRate.rateDesc: Enter the shipping rate for all target countries

summary.multiCountriesFlatRateForAll: Flat rate for all target countries

validationErrors.missingRateOption: To continue, you must select a rating option and indicate your rates and delivery time accordingly

validationErrors.needAtLeastOneCarrier: You need to enable at least one carrier to continue
validationErrors.needAtLeastOneCarrierForEachCountry: To continue, you need to activate and complete at least one carrier for each selected target country

deliveryTimeAndRates.productAvailaibleIn: The dropdown list of countries below would match the countries and currency you’ve set up on your shop. You can select the countries where you would like your products to be displayed.
deliveryTimeAndRates.ifMultipleCountries: If you target multiple countries, each product price will be automatically converted to the correct currency in Google. However your store must have configured shipping and tax rates for each selected country. Please respect [country-specific shopping policies]({0})[:target="_blank"] and [local regulation]({1})[:target="_blank"]
deliveryTimeAndRates.placeholderSelect: Select the countries where your products are available
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingSettingsErrors: This country is not compatible with your currency
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingDescription1: PrestaShop will import your carriers list from your store settings and allow you to provide additional information.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingLabel2: Skip and setup later in Google Merchant Center
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingDescription2: You will have to enter your product shipping information yourself in Google Merchant center.
deliveryTimeAndRates.noticeSetupShipping: Your products won’t sync until you setup your products shipping information.
deliveryTimeAndRates.taxSettingsDescription: So that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for a product, you must submit the taxes that you collect. Select how you want to set up tax settings.
deliveryTimeAndRates.manualImportTax: Manually set up tax settings in Google Merchant Center
deliveryTimeAndRates.alertTaxes: You must submit the taxes that you collect, so that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for your products.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shipToCustomerTooltip: Select if this carrier delivers to a customer’s address or not (service point, in store pickup). Google only allows enabling carriers who ship to an address.
deliveryTimeAndRates.handlingTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes you to prepare an order until it’s picked up by the carrier in working days.
deliveryTimeAndRates.transitTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes for your order to be shipped to the customer once it leaves your facility.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingInformationIntro: Rates from enabled carriers will be displayed to customers who are browsing your products on Google.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingTableNotice: Google cannot support carrier with pick up in store delivery type, please make sure you disable them or switch to another method.
deliveryTimeAndRates.carriersDropdownHiddenLabel: Copy information of the carrier to other carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.noCarriersTitle: You don’t have any shipping carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.noCarriersDescription: Please head to carriers page to add shipping carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.countryNeededDescription: Please enter target countries to display relevant shipping settings in the table
deliveryTimeAndRates.refreshCarriers: Refresh if you have edited your carriers

export.prohibitedContentNotice: Please review the [prohibited content guidelines]({0})[:target="_blank"] to ensure that products in your feed don’t violate these policies.

attributeMapping.title1: 1. Choose all characteristics that apply to your products
attributeMapping.description1: This will allow you to map mandatory Google product attributes at the next step depending on your catalog.
attributeMapping.title2: 2. Map mandatory Google attributes to your custom fields
attributeMapping.description2: Fill in all values to ensure your products are validated. If a value is missing in your catalog, we recommend you create it and complete the setup later. Keep in mind that Google will favor first filled values.
attributeMapping.apparelAndAccessoriesSubtitle: i.e clothing, bags, shoes or hats
attributeMapping.electronicsTitle: I sell Home and/or Kitchen appliances
attributeMapping.electronicsSubtitle: i.e refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, light bulbs
attributeMapping.variantSetsSubtitle: i.e different graphic prints, patterns, fabrics or materials
attributeMapping.learnRequirementsProductSpecification: Learn more about requirements & supported values for the Shopping product data specification
attributeMapping.footerNotice: Describe your product data using attributes. Additionally to required minimum for standard free listings, you can add additional attributes required for enhanced listing. General rule is: the more attributes the better.
attributeMapping.addNewAttributes: Add new attributes in your PrestaShop Catalog
attributeMapping.refreshAttributes: Refresh if you have edited your attributes
attributeMapping.requiredForSomeCategories: This field is required for some product categories. [See more]({0})[:target="_blank" class="external_link-no_icon"]
attributeMapping.learnHowToSetupShippingSettings: Learn how to set up shipping

methodSynch.title: Select the method for products syncing
methodSynch.synchAllProductsDesc: The entire catalog will be synchronized.
methodSynch.synchFilteredProductsDesc: Only the products you select will be synchronized.

alerts.countProducts: We haven't found any products matching your selection. Change your filters and try again. | product selected. | products selected.
alerts.erreurCountApi: We are not able to retrieve the requested data right now. Check your configuration and try again later.

syncSchedule.title: Synchronization schedule
syncSchedule.subTitle: Choose the time when you want the first synchronization to start, the export might slow down your traffic
syncSchedule.radioLabel1: Now, after I finish my configuration (The export might slow down your shop)
syncSchedule.radioLabel2: Later, appproximatley at 2:00 AM (GMT+1) (When your shop have few visits)

summary.title1: Next synchronization is planned in {0} hours
summary.attributeMapped: One category have been mapped | {0} categories have been mapped
summary.mandatoryAttributesNotMapped: One Google attributes haven't been mapped to your custom fields | {0} Google attributes haven't been mapped to your custom fields.
summary.noticeToCompleteMapping: We recommend mapping all your data otherwise your products might be rejected by Google.
summary.agreementTitle: I understand and agree to the following conditions*
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel1Instant: The synchronization of my product feed will run after I click on save and export (It might take between 1 to 4 hours)
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel1Default: The synchronization of my product feed will take time at {time} (It might take between 1 to 4 hours)
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel2: Google products reviews may take between 3 to 5 business days
summary.disabledButtonTooltip: Check our conditions before moving forward
summary.syncScheduledNow: Today, right after I save and export

freeListingCard.title: Show your products with free listings
freeListingCard.intro: Showcase your product for free in organically-ranked listing on Shopping tab.
freeListingCard.seeFreeListing: See my free listings in Merchant Center
freeListingCard.googleDelay: It takes 3-5 business days to review products
freeListingCard.alertEnableFreeListing: Enable free listings to show your products on Shopping tab for free.
freeListingCard.alertCantEnableFreeListing: You can't enable free listings right now. Try again later.
freeListingCard.alertCountryNotEligible: The target country you have selected is not eligible for free listings and ads.

googleAdsAccountCard.title: Google Ads account
googleAdsAccountCard.intro: Create adverstising campaigns for your products: find the right audience at the right time.
googleAdsAccountCard.text: Once connected you may need to configure your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.labelSelect: You can connect an existing Google Ads account, or create a new one in a few easy steps.
googleAdsAccountCard.toUseGAdsNeedsAdminAccess: To use an existing Google Ads account, you must have Admin access.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCantConnect: Could not connect your Google Ads account, it's on our side, please give it another try.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertBillingSettingsMissing: To launch Performance Max campaigns, you need to add your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterBilling: Once filled in your billing info in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterInvitationLink: Once the invitation is accepted in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedValidationFromEmail: Please click here or check your emails to validate your account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertSuspended: You need to resolve issues in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCancelled: You need to reactivate your account in your Google Ads account.

email.title: Your Google email address
email.description: The email address below is the one provided during your Google account connection

business.name: Business name
business.title: Business information
business.description: The currency you choose for your account will be fixed after, so choose it carefully.

terms.title: Terms of service for Google Program
terms.label: I have read and agree with [Google Ads terms and conditions]({0})[:target="_blank" class="ps_gs-fz-12"]

smartShoppingCampaignCard.title: Boost your sales with Performance Max Campaigns
smartShoppingCampaignCard.introNotConnected: Connect or create your Google Ads account and launch a Performance Max campaign for your products. Maximize your campaign performance across multiple Google channels through one single campaign. Show your ads where they have higher chances of driving conversion. Even better, you don't pay unless your customers click.
smartShoppingCampaignCard.introConnected: With Performance Max, you can advertise your products and maximize your ads performance across multiple Google channels through one single campaign. Even better, you don’t pay unless your customers click!
smartShoppingCampaignCard.footer: In the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom or Switzerland, Performance Max campaigns can be used with any Comparison Shopping Service (CSS) you work with. The ads will show on general search results pages and on any other surfaces the CSS has opted in to.
smartShoppingCampaignCard.contentInfo: Advertisers who upgrade Smart Shopping campaigns to Performance Max see an average increase of 12% in conversion value at the same or better return on ad spend (ROAS)*

enhancedConversionTrackingCard.title: Enhanced conversion tracking
enhancedConversionTrackingCard.intro: Improve your conversion tracking accuracy and unlock more powerful bidding. This feature works alongside your existing conversion tags, sending secure, privacy-friendly conversion data from your website to Google.

signTosAlert.title: Improve your conversion tracking & unlock more powerful bidding to your Ads
signTosAlert.text: Enable enhanced conversion tracking by simply agreeing to Google Ads' terms of service

enableEnhancedConversionAlert.title: Ready to enable enhanced conversion tracking feature
enableEnhancedConversionAlert.text: Your Google Ads' terms of service are up-to-date, head to your configuration page to enable your new feature

smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameHelper: The name must be unique and 125 chars max.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameTooltip: Choose a name that clearly describes the theme of the campaign so that you can easily find it in your account. Your campaign name isn't visible to your customers.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCampaignNameTooLongFeedback: The name must be less than 125 characters in length.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationHelper: We recommend a minimum duration of 30 days so that Google can optimize your campaign.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationTooltip: Ad campaigns have no end date by default, so that the ads are able to run indefinitely. You can always add an end date to create a shorter campaign.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationInvalidFeedback: The end date must be set in the future.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDatePickerHelper: Use cursor keys to navigate calendar dates
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryHelper: To target multiple countries you have to create multiple campaigns.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryImutable: Country can't be changed after creation, if you want to target a different country, you'll need to create a new campaign
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryTooltip: Your campaign’s ads are eligible to show to customers in your targeted geographic locations, or to customers who have selected your targeted language as their browser’s language setting.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersPartialLabel: Select products using product partition filters
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersHelper: Take some time to [read Google Shopping ads policies]({0})[:target="_blank"] some product are prohibited or restricted.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetHelper: The minimum budget varies based on your target country. Please select a country to see the exact minimum required.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetHelperForTargetCountry: The minimum for {country} is {budget}, ensuring sufficient reach for your campaign in this region.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetInvalidFeedback: Your daily budget must be a valid number greater than 1. For any decimal number, please use a dot as separator.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetBeforeThresholdFeedback: Minimum budget required for this target country is {budget}. Please increase your budget to continue.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetTooltip: To ensure Ad performance, the base minimum depends on your target country and the budget you choose is entirely up to you, and you can adjust it at any time.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.formHelperDescription: Your campaign will run until you pause it or as soon as end date is meet. You can pause it at any time.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorNoProducts: You want to launch a campaign, but your Google merchant center does not contain any products yet. Your campaign will start only when at least one product has been approved by Google.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorApi: We were not able to publish your campaign, please try again
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorFetchingFilters: We were not able to retrieve all filters from Google. You can't modify them for now.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapNoFiltersDescription: All synced products approved by Google
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapFooter: Check the information of your campaign before validating it. You can always modify some parameters while the campaign is in progress.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationRemarketingTag: Enable remarketing  tags on my site
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationNewRemarketingTag: Create a new remarketing and conversion tracking tag to your shop
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.enableCreationRemarketingTag: Enable remarketing and conversion tracking tag
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.pauseCampaign: Your campaign will run until you pause it or as soon as end date is meet. You can pause it at any time.

alerts.noTag: By not adding the tag automatically Google will not be able to send campaigns results
alerts.noConversionActions: The tracking tag has been enabled, but there is no conversion action set on the shop. This can be fixed by creating new ones.
alerts.hasUnhandledFilters: At least one filter of this campaign is not supported by this module. To prevent any loss on your existing configuration, only basic details of the campaign can be modified.
alerts.PMaxExplanationTitle: Performance Max is a new goal-based campaign.
alerts.PMaxExplanation: Performance Max is an enhanced campaign type powered by Google's smart technology. It can help you optimize your ads across multiple Google channels and drive better results for your business.

budgetTip.content: To ensure the success of your campaign, it’s essential to adjust your daily ad budget according to the target country. For instance, a starting point of {budget} is recommended for {country}. By choosing your target country, you can identify the ideal budget to meet your objectives. Remember, this foundational budget is more than just a figure – it’s a key component of your campaign strategy. A well-planned budget facilitates efficient ad testing and refinement, enabling you to customize your expenditure to the unique requirements of your business and enhance overall campaign performance.

alert.googleIsReviewing:
Your products are being reviewed.  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, your products will be available for free listings and ads.
alert.alertSuccess: You are successfully opted in. Once your products are approved, they can appear in Google Shopping tab search results.

productVerification.stepTitle: Products verified by Prestashop before sent to Google
productVerification.stepDetails:
Before sending all your products (including variations), we ensure their compliance with Google's Merchant center policies. We verify the products **every time a change is detected**, and if there are any non-compliant products, we provide guidance on what needs to be done. Click on non-compliant products for more information.

After submission, Google assigns each product a status: **Approved, Expiring, Pending** or **Disapproved**.

reportCards.productsInCatalogDescription: Active products with variations in product feed languages.
reportCards.verifiedDescription: PrestaShop-approved products ready to be sent to Google.
reportCards.nonCompliantDescription: Products that do not meet Google's requirements.

productsSentToGoogle.stepDetails:
This report displays the status of all your products that have been sent to Google Merchant Center. Please note that it may take a few days for Google to review your products. You can use this report to track the progress of each product and ensure that they are approved and active on Google Shopping.

**‘Approved’ products** are fully approved and eligible to appear in free listings on Google.

**‘Pending’ products** are being processed by Google. They will not appear in listings until they are approved.

**‘Expiring’ products** will become inactive and no longer appear in Google listings in the next days.

**‘Disapproved’ products** are inactive and do not appear in Google listings. You can click on Disapproved box for more information.

reportCards.expiringDescription: Invalid products to be removed from Google soon.
reportCards.disapprovedDescription: Products that are disapproved by Google.

compliancyIssuesPage.details: To ensure a successful pre-scan with Google, please fix the issues outlined in the table below. Taking care of these issues will help your list your product on Google’s surfaces.

compliancyIssues.nameMissingAction: A product name is a unique identifier used to describe a product, and it is important because it helps improves visibility in search engine results. In PrestaShop, product names can be entered in the Catalog > Product > in the "Product Name" section.
compliancyIssues.imageMissingAction: A product image is a visual representation of a product that helps customers understand what the product looks like. It is important to have product images because it can help increase product appeal and sales, and can enhance the overall shopping experience. Product images can be added or edited in Catalog > Product > in the "Images" section.
compliancyIssues.linkMissingAction: Product link are mandatory. Please update your product page to generate a product link.
compliancyIssues.descriptionMissingAction: Add a description in your products. If you already have a description, check the attribute picked for description in the Attribute mapping configuration of the module.
compliancyIssues.brandMissingAction: Please provide the Brand of the product. You can add a Brand in Catalog > Products > Basic settings in the Brand section for each product.
compliancyIssues.identifierMissing: Provide either GTIN or Brand and MPN for the product
compliancyIssues.identifierMissingAction:
**Products with GTINs**

A GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) is a **unique identifier** used to identify products. The GTIN include **UPC** (in North America), **EAN** (in Europe), **JAN** (in Japan), and **ISBN** (for books). You can add a GTIN in Catalog > Products > Options > in the Condition & References for each product.

The GTIN identifier can usually be found on the product's barcode label, packaging, or documentation, or contacting the manufacturer. 

**Products without a GTIN**

To help identify your products without a GTIN, you can use the **MPN** and **brand** attributes. 

Brand is the brand of the product or your company. You can also use your store name as the brand. You can add a brand in Catalog > Products > Basic settings in the Brand section for each product.

An MPN or Manufacturer Part Number attribute to indicate the manufacturer reference of your product or unique identifier number of your choice.
compliancyIssues.priceMissingAction: Please provide a price for the product.

approvalTable.description: Below, you'll find a list of **{productTotal} products** that didn't pass the approval process. For each product, we've provided the reasons for disapproval to facilitate swift corrections. After making the necessary updates, these products can be synchronized with Google Shopping.
approvalTable.noReasonFallback: *Not provided, check [account errors on your Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"].*

productIssuesModal.title: More details about your product issues
productIssuesModal.description: Here are the reasons for suspension provided by Google. Take the necessary steps to meet the requirements and wait for the next scan.
productIssuesModal.footer: Visit your [product sheet]({0})[:target="_blank"] to make the necessary changes to your product to meet Google's requirements and get it approved.

help.intro: PrestaShop Marketing makes it easy to connect your store with Google and promote your products to millions of shoppers across multiple Google channels. Create Performance Max campaigns without leaving your PrestaShop dashboard and drive more traffic.

allowsYouTo.title: This module allows you to:
allowsYouTo.easySync: Easily sync your product catalog with Google to keep product details such as price and availability automatically updated
allowsYouTo.freeListing: Enable free listings and broaden your reach by showing your products to shoppers browsing on the Shopping tab, for free
allowsYouTo.campaigns: Get started with Performance Max campaigns, set a daily budget and let Google’s machine learning optimize your campaigns
allowsYouTo.reporting: Analyze your campaign performance without leaving PrestaShop

help.needHelp: Need help? Find here the documentation of this module.
help.couldntFindAnyAnswer: Could not find any answer to your question?

modal.textDisconnectGoogleAccount: You are about to disconnect Google account. This will remove access to Google, Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
modal.textDisconnectMCA: Disconnecting your Merchant Center will remove access to your Google Ads in this module and pause any running campaign.
modal.textoverwrite:
Overwriting existing claim will deactivate your previous account and pause existing campaigns tied to that account- free listings and Shopping campaigns.  
If you are running a different Shopping campaign, we recommend pausing it.
modal.textCancelProductFeed: You will lose all unsaved changes if you Continue. To successully submit your product data to Google, you need to complete all steps.
modal.textOverwriteProductFeed: Overwriting your existing product feed will delete it. You will need to configure new product feed.
modal.textDisconnectGoogleAds: Disconnecting from your Google Ads account will remove the ability to run Performance Max campaigns from the module.
modal.pauseCampaignsExplainations: By pausing all your campaigns, the billing will stop. You can restart your campaigns at any time in your Google ads account.
modal.removeTag: Remove “Remarketing and conversion” tag from my shop
modal.removeTagExplainations: Removing the tag means that Google will no longer be able to track your campaigns. We recommend that you only remove the tag if you plan to completely remove the module or change your account. You can always add it yourself in the code of your site.
modal.titleActivateTracking: Measure the effectiveness of your Ads
modal.textActivateTracking:
To run Performance Max campaigns effectively, Google Ads requires the ability to generate remarketing lists and add conversion tracking tags to your list.

Clicking on confirm means you accept that PrestaShop automatically installs code snippets on your store:
- Add Google tag on my store
- Configure conversion actions : Page views, Add to cart, Purchase
modal.textConfirmCancel: If you go back you will lose your selected values
modal.disconnectedUserBo: You have been disconnected from the backoffice. You will be automatically redirected to the login page in {0} seconds.
modal.titleEnhancedConversionsIntro: Measure the effectiveness of your Ads
modal.textEnhancedConversionsIntro: Enhance your conversion tracking accuracy and empower your bidding strategy with our latest feature: Enhanced Conversion Tracking. This feature seamlessly integrates with your existing conversion tags, ensuring the secure and privacy-conscious transmission of conversion data from your website to Google.
modal.textActivationEnhancedConversionsIntro: Activating it is easy – just agree to the terms of service on Google Ads. The feature is accessible on your configuration’s page below conversion tracking tag.

banner.titleAdsbanner: Just starting out in Google advertising?
banner.textAdsBannerLong: Get {0} of Google Ads credits* when you spend at least {0} to create your first campaigns on PrestaShop or directly via your [Google Ads Account]({1})[:target="_blank"].
banner.textAdsBanner: Get {0} of Google Ads credits* when you spend at least {0} to create your first campaigns.
banner.legendLong: *Your voucher will be applied automatically from the moment you start spending! *The amount needs to be spent within 60 days of the first campaign spend and credits will be valid for 60 days once credited. [Read T&C]({0})[:target="_blank"]
banner.legend: *Create a new Google Ads account, the voucher will be applied automatically once you match the spend and you will have 60 days to spend the credits. [Read T&C]({0})[:target="_blank"]
banner.legendWithoutTC: * Create a new Google Ads account, the voucher will be applied automatically once you match the spend and you will have 60 days to spend the credits.
banner.textCampaignsBanner: Create your first campaign and reach more relevant shoppers across all Google’s channels. Let Google’s machine learning optimize your ad placements and efficiently improve your traffic and sales.
